website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a backpack that has some practical features and a design your child will love, this 12" model is worth considering.
pros: Kids love this backpack's animal face design and are excited to carry it
In addition to being cute, it has a spacious main compartment, insulated front snack pocket, and water bottle pocket
cons: Interior stitching is prone to unraveling
Not large enough to zip completely if you put a standard notebook or folder in it

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Preschooler Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome backpack for a preschooler. It has a large main compartment, a medium-sized front zip compartment with a mesh pocket, and a side bottle holder. It's high quality too. I didn't want to get my son one of those cheap and cheap-looking backpacks, ya know?! We also have the matching insulated lunch bag, plate and bowl set, and fork and spoon set. The photo was taken 2 months before our son turned 3 (getting off the airplane.) He's 95th percentile height (40") and weight (38 lbs) and wears 4T, so the pic should give you an idea of the backpack size. It should probably work for ages 2 through 6.
customer_reviews.author: StefLBC

customer_reviews.title: Small, but Mighty Cute
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is a tiny bag. It does not really fit large books and the straps are obviously made for younger kids. However, as a grown adult man I love using this as a gym bag. It's adorable and fits all my swimming and gym equipment perfectly. I wouldn't recommend this bag is you're a serious student with larger book, but if you want an adorable gym bag then this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and I loved them. We got the bag and lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I loved them. We got the bag and lunch bag. Perfect for Pre-K. So cute I had to put her name on the bags.
customer_reviews.author: BevI.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this backpack! It's cute, and my son LOVES taking a backpack to "school" every morning just like his big sisters. He even hauled it across the Chicago airport on his own at Christmastime--and he was only 18 months old! It's just his size and fits a lunchbox, a change of clothes perfectly, with room for a couple little toys, a pair of shoes, a lovey, or his winter hat, as well. Great quality with large zipper pulls so he can zip it himself. Holds its shape well, so it's easy for him to set it down and put things in it. Definitely a good buy. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old started PreK this year and she loves this bookbag. She is very tall for her age and wears a size 7-8, but this bookbag still fits her very well. The only issue I have is that a regular sized folder, from her class, will not fit in the bag. Her teacher has to fold the folder in half. I’m sure the dimensions are listed, and my fault for not paying attention, but we love the bag so much we don’t care that the folder doesn’t fit. The quality of the bag is great. The zippers are not flimsy, the seams of the bag seem well put together. I think it will last her the whole year.
customer_reviews.author: Abbi Sims

customer_reviews.title: I love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. I could not find the Bee in my usual store, so I was happy to find it on Amazon. And the price was equivalent or even less then I would have paid in the store. My daughter's nickname is Be so I had to get this for her! It is one of the toddler sized backpacks. Size wise it works well for my 3 year old. Seem to resist dirt. Not too dirty yet :-). We have not tested it in day to day going to preschool yet! But so far staying in my car for extra clothes and to go to activities it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I have had the unicorn version for my daughter for 3 years and it still looks awesome. I just throw it in the washing machine and air dry and it cleans up great. She uses hers for preschool- it doesn’t really hold like a folder, but you can stuff it in there with the corners bent in or just fold papers. She doesn’t have anything super important that it’s used for, so it’s not an issue for us. I bought the fox one for my 2.5 yo to put his snacks, toys, and other items in when we run errands, so I don’t have to keep up with all stuffed in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Bought years ago buying again for another little one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this years ago for our than 4 year old. Now we have another 2 year old and this will be a Christmas gift. It is very cute but maybe more importantly last my daughter well over 4 + years and was finally donated when she grew out of it (before we new we would have another one) with a bit of wear but still lots of life. It has plenty of room for a few books and toys and snacks + extras. I would highly recommend for every toddler on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Shaylin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Skip Hop brand. Its affordable and durable and so cute!!! My daughter is loving her new big girl diaper bag! She is 2.5years. This will last her awhile. Its not too big. I wanted something that she could take with her to run errands and playdates. It fits change of clothes, tablet, snacks, a few toys, diapers and small wipes. And the front zipper pocket is a great addition. She has this butterfly pattern in a lunchbox and dishes. This is a great on the go bag for toddlers/preschool.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McClintock

customer_reviews.title: Durable and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is adorable! The colors on the screen are true and the quality is great. It has proved sturdy as my 2 yr old had used it on our daily eco tours which include hiking, duck feeding and rock throwing in the river for the past month and it looks exactly like it did when it arrived. It can hold her stickers, numerous snacks, coloring book and crayons, bubbles, a ball and a stuffed toy comfortably. It also has a small front pocket and bottle holder for her juice. Definitely a Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Small, Cute and Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my 2 year old because she absolutely loves to pack things up and carry them around and was looking for something on the smaller side that wouldn't be too big for her. This backpack is super cute (I bought the Fox) and seems to be very well made. Its small enough for her to carry around easily. I wish it had a strap across the middle as well to make it stay on better, as my daughter is very petite so sometimes the straps slide off her shoulders but other than that is is a great backpack and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittny Doolittle

customer_reviews.title: The BEST preschooler bookbag! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I went through three other book bags before I landed the right one. This one was the winner. I brought expensive ones that strap didn’t stay on the shoulder. Cheap ones that didn’t fit much with no water bottle compartment. This was more than right. I HIGHLY recommend this bag to every parent looking for a PRESCHOOL BAG. My daughter is in a full day 3PREK. LOVE IT! PROS 1. Comfortable 2. Durable material 3. Spacious 4. Not heavy 5. Fits a lot 6. All compartments are large 7. Fashionable 8. Washable CONS None
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as a school bag because it doesn't fit a standard 8.5x11" folder...
customer_reviews.text: This is great to carry around an iPad and headphones, but it doesn't really work for preschool & kindergarten because it can't hold a folder. Our preschool specifically said "No Skip Hop backpacks"...I had given one as a gift to a friend's child who encountered the exact same problem at a different school. It is adorable, though, and actually fits on little kid's backs proportionally. I kinda blame the schools and think everything should be smaller for them! :)
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMan

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after searching for the best bag I could get for my three-year-old daughter. She has dragged it around everywhere for months and still not a single rip, hole, or fray anywhere. Zipper is a little tight, but I like that it's never bound up or failed. A very well constructed bag at a fraction of the cost of many name brand backpacks. It's the perfect size for my toddler. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Shrek

customer_reviews.title: Good material; Toddler bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a good backpack for a toddler (2-3). I wouldn’t recommend it as a school age backpack since it’s still small in size and you wouldn’t be able to fit their folders or other school supplies in it. I use it to keep extra clothes, snacks and my daughters bottle. She can fit her iPad mini in it too and some toys. We had a backpack harness that I bought from Carters and she use to put her toys in it but it was really small. The material seems the same on both bags and it has a name tag on the inside too.
customer_reviews.author: liz3917

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful backpacks!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these toddler backpacks for my four year old and my three year old, so they could begin to carry their tablet and other toys and belongings when we go out, and I am loving them! The backpacks seem very well made, sturdy, and comfortable for them to carry around. They love to put them on, and carry their own stuff everywhere we go, they are a great size and hold a good amount of things in them. We usually put their tablet, a couple of toys, a change of clothing, some snacks, and their drink and there is still room left! Definitely something to consider purchasing if you have any toddlers!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 3 year old preschooler
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the color yellow and bees so she was super excited when this arrived. We’ve had it for a couple weeks now and she carry’s it everywhere with her. It’s the perfect size for her and the large zippers mean she can get in and out of the bag on her own. She usually carry’s her pull ups, wipes, hand sanitizer, change of clothes, water bottle, school folder, occasional snacks and or toys.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great lunchbox! Your child will love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lunchbox. I bought it for my 4 year old who goes on field trips a lot. It’s durable, handle on top can clip to backpack if needed, and I like the pocket on the inside to hold a fork/napkin. The one thing I didn’t like was it’s kind of small on the inside. We use a lot of Tupperware instead of ziploc bags. And I couldn’t fit a sandwich Tupperware and 2 small ones and a juice box. So I just used ziploc for the fruit and it fit better.
customer_reviews.author: mikael wright

customer_reviews.title: my favorite backpack for little kids
customer_reviews.text: Not only are these backpacks cute and roomy but they also sit nicely - i.e. the bottom is flat so it stands upright, which other backpacks I have purchased do not. It's one of those things you don't realize you appreciate until you buy another backpack that doesn't! Makes it easier to pack for my kids' day at daycare. I just wish the outside was easier to clean. I have run mine thru the washing machine cycle and still over time the outside ends up beat up looking and dingy. Still, the material holds out and so it is hard to complain, for the price, but I do wish the material was a bit easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B. Siddique

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unicorn backpack for my three year old daughter. She had been pretending things were backpacks, so I figured I’d finally get her a real one. She actually jumped up and down clapping when she saw it! She has been wearing it around the house and has no problems with the size of the backpack or using the zippers. I’m pretty much always happy with Skip-Hop, but this backpack was probably one of the best items from the brand that I’ve purchased. You can fit toys, shoes, and an outfit or two in there. Also, lunch bags. Would be useful for a child in daycare or preschool.
customer_reviews.author: S. E.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: This bag is adorable and we love it for traveling and when we want backup toys to keep my daughter busy. But it is not suitable for pre-K or kinder students. Because it's only 12" tall it doesn't fit a regular pocket folder. And I had to buy a different backpack for school. If they made it bigger(14"-16") in this style, I'd buy another one for my daughter to take to school because she already has the matching lunch box.
customer_reviews.author: Julia S

customer_reviews.title: Cutest little backpack
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our two year old so she could hold some of her things when we go out instead of trying to cram it into our diaper bag. (We also have a 4 month old) The quality is outstanding and it is so cute. People are constantly stopping us and asking where we got it. It really is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Garren Allred

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bright colors and good quality fabric
customer_reviews.text: Love this whole line! I have purchased several of these items for my daughter. This backpack is awesome and super cute. It’s small enough for my two year old to wear but big enough for her to fit her toys or water play day at school. The fabric seems really resistant and the colors are nice and bright. I haven’t had to wash it yet but I also have the lunch box and I have washed that one several times and it’s held really good so should the backpack but I will update a few months from now. Hope this helps! If it does please give me a helpful vote :)
customer_reviews.author: Giselle Caceres

customer_reviews.title: great toddler bookbag!
customer_reviews.text: my daughter thinks this book bag is the best thing ever. she has the monkey one as well & she'll alternate depending on her mood. she loves this unicorn one though. she'll bring it with her where ever. we took it camping & to the beach, def. a sturdy little book bag. we were able to stuff it with her stuffy, blankie, sunscreen, snacks, books, etc.
customer_reviews.author: ahhhchooo

customer_reviews.title: 2yo loved it
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 2yo for her birthday filled with books and crafts. She LOVED it. Wouldn't take it off all day, and took it to daycare several days in a row. I use it mainly to pack activities for road trips. It's a bit small, so it doesn't fit all books, and there's no organization on the inside (it's just one big pocket), so not perfect but I knew what I was getting. My older daughter has another in this line that we fill with activities for airport and airplane rides--for that purpose (and I am sure others), it's convenient that there is a pocket for a water bottle on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: AOB512

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for a toddler!
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old daughter needed something small to carry around when she started potty training instead of my big diaper bag. This is the perfect size! I throw my keys, wallet and phone in there with some pull ups, wipes, snacks and a sippy cup and we're ready to go anywhere! It's small enough for her to wear it on her back but big enough to hold everything we need. We take this bag everywhere! Very durable and well made!
customer_reviews.author: Karianne Haga

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just like the picture - Very sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: This backpack looks so cute!!!!!! I got this for my nephew in Argentina. This brand is known there but really expensive and I was able to get the product here on Amazon at a really affordable price. The picture is exactly what you get. The material looks like it will last him until he goes to college. LOL :) Looking forward to see him wearing it
customer_reviews.author: RomiNation

customer_reviews.title: These are so cute and well made!
customer_reviews.text: We loved them! they fit well for my 4 and 5 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Gino M

customer_reviews.title: Fun and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about these backpacks, this is our second and I am sure we will get another. They take a beating and are played with all the time. Our girls have never had issues with the zippers and they love the front pocket to hide things in. My oldest daughter took it to two years of preschool and it still looks new. They are on the smaller size so it's definitely more of a prek bag, but for our purposes; prek and play, it's gone above and beyond our expectations. I love getting them when they are on sale and giving them birthday presents they are so fun and durable!
customer_reviews.author: David and Kay-Marie Stanger

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack!!
customer_reviews.text: We love skip hop! Their quality surpasses much else that’s out there. This backpack is functional and adorable. There’s surprisingly a ton of room in both pockets. Our (almost) 3 year old uses it for a spare set of clothes and his snacks when we’re out running errands. We have the giraffe one for our 4 year old, it was secondhand and still in great shape after years of use!! Never disappointed when it comes to skip hop products!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Seems well-made and sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: When I first held the backpack I was immediately impressed by the quality. SInce this is being given to a 3yo, it's important that things can withstand that type handling. I bought this as a big brother gift for my son from his coming baby sister! I know he'll love it. I was able to fit a few other treats in the bag,including a book!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great travel backpack for kids
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 9 year old who was using it to hold her games and snacks while we traveled across the country. It was the perfect size for her to take on the plane. We packed lots of items with plenty of room left over: to a coloring book, a chapter book, light sweater, hat, box of crayons, DS, snacks, and a few small toys. The backpack it's self is extremely well made. The straps adjust easily and stay put when you set them and the zipper is easy to grab to open a close again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Risser

customer_reviews.title: Magically cute bag
customer_reviews.text: Not very big, but we use it as a day bag for my 9 month old. It is a Toddler Backpack for daycare or pre-K. It holds 4-10 diapers (depending on size), a pop up pouch of wipes, a bottle or two, 3 pacis, and a few small toys AT MOST. This should not be used as a diaper bag if your child needs more than that in a day. But it’s just the cutest darn thing! I get a ton of compliments on it. Well made, durable, washes easy with a clean cloth and soap and water. No washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: My toddler LOVES his backpack! He wears it around the house and likes to bring it when we go out. It is so cute, but makes him look like a big boy! The backpack itself is bigger than I expected and can fit a ton of stuff: several Pull Ups, a change of clothes, wipes, and toy dinosaurs!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece after a friend recommended it. It is such a cute backpack. It’s slightly too large for my 2 year old niece still, but she still loves to carry it around anyways. It has plenty of space and enough compartments.
customer_reviews.author: mkysayTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: ... the unicorn for my seven month old and it’s adorable. I also bought the leopard for my two ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the unicorn for my seven month old and it’s adorable. I also bought the leopard for my two year old niece. I use the one for my baby as a “diaper bag” for short trips like to the store or a doctors appointment. Just a cute grab and go bag and it definitely can hold all the basics. I plan to give it to her when she is a toddler to play with. My only gripe is that I wish the bag was a plastic material so I could wipe it down easier. I can see the canvas type material holding onto stains.
customer_reviews.author: LorraineTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to find a backpack that a toddler can easily carry, but this one works. The pouch on the side is perfect for water bottles. I use the front for diapers and the inside for a spare change of clothes and wipes. It is easy to spot among the other backpacks at my daughters preschool. I throw it in the washing machine about once or twice a month and it comes out good as new. The only problem I have with the backpack is that many people think it is a rhino instead of a unicorn.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter loves this backpack. Going two years strong and it still looks new. It's her bag we send with her everywhere she goes. It got pretty dirty and I was sure I'd have to replace it, but I used some laundry soap and scrubbed it up. Bam. New again.
customer_reviews.author: Whittney J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my 2 year old and our adventures. It fits all his snacks, few diapers, small toys, change of clothes and a drink quite well. It's cute and adorable, and held up well in the washing machine (I did hang dry!). He had out grown his other backpack (the owl with the lead attachment that had survived his brother before!). Will be getting the matching lunchbox soon...(already have the matching drink bottle!).
customer_reviews.author: PokeyNBug

customer_reviews.title: Great gifting - easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gifts for my goddaughters (their mom was having a unicorn themed baby shower and we gifted them some big sister unicorn shirts along with these). These bags were a hit! My teen fell in love with it and is wanting one for herself. Bags are well sized for kids and material is easy to clean. Has a place to write owners name inside main compartment and a well sized bottle holders on the side. Little compartment is decent size as well.
customer_reviews.author: RoxShinobi

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is soooo adorable, my 3 year old daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is soooo adorable, my 3 year old daughter loves it!! I had purchased her the owl lunch box a while before this backpack and she wouldnt leave without it, now the same goes for her backpack, she is so proud of her matching set and I love that's its not pink or flowery (love gender neutral colors) because that means when she doesn't want it anymore I can give it away to either a boy or a girl. The only thing I wish was that it had a zipper pocket on the inside to keep little items, but Im grateful for the side pocket to put her water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn happiness
customer_reviews.text: Came just as pictured and will fit my three year old daughter perfectly. It has one large pocket, with a little spot to write their name. A medium size front pocket, with a mesh pencil pocket inside. Cute rainbow zippers. This is a great little backpack for a preschooler. It's very nicely made. I can't wait for my daughter to see it on her birthday. I'm filling it with surprises and the matching snack cup for her trip to the zoo on her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Leah M

customer_reviews.title: Very cute. A bit small.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 1yr old for daycare. It's cute and seems well made, but it's a bit small. By the time I put her lunch bag in, there isn't room for much more, like extra clothes or hats and mittens for outside. Definitely can't fit her coat in as well. I'd say it's not much larger than a big lunch box. So it's ok for a very small child, but not kindergarten or elementary school aged. There's no way my 3yr old could use this for what she needs to take To daycare each day.
customer_reviews.author: Liz L.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and practical preschool backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Skip Hop Zoo toddler backpack. The first one we purchased was the butterfly for one daughter, this one is the unicorn for the other. The size is very practical for a preschooler to put on themselves and wear, which makes them feel like a big deal. The zipper is very easy to operate. It’s the perfect size for a child to bring a change of clothes and a toy or other show and tell item to preschool. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Van Kleeck

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Bee Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our granddaughter's first birthday. My son said they use it all the time, just the right size for a day out somewhere or an overnight. It is made very well. The Bee Backpack is a great gift or for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Darbi J. Rash

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, convenient backpack
customer_reviews.text: I got this super cute backpack for my toddler. We take it to school everyday and it goes everywhere we go on the weekends. I have not needed to wash it yet. Once I had to spot clean spaghetti off of it and that was super easy, I used soap and water and it came right off. This bag looks small but it holds a lot. The straps are adjustable so that we can both carry the backpack comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Keness W

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This bag is not the same size as a regular backpack just so you know. We used it to tote around books and walkman, cd player and cds and tapes for her books on tape while we were traveling. We put 6,000 miles on our trip so obviously it was dragged and beaten up alot. The zipper never failed and there are no tears or holes anywhere. Great item for little guys that aren't very careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it! Fits my daughter perfectly! She’s in preschool and I needed something that wasn’t too big or too small and this one fit the bill. She can get it on and off by herself easily, it can hold her parent/teacher folder her lunch box and them some. It’s a great visual when we go out and I can spot her easily because the colors are bright and vivid. She is 3yrs old and on the tall side 41inch and this fits her great.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: Very durable long lasting backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Great little backpacks! Very durable material and awesome price point. We bought the unicorn one for my daughter when she was two and she still wears it regularly 2.5 years later. Just bought our two year old son the dinosaur one and he is over the moon. Love the expandable water bottle holder and the waterproof material used in the small pocket, great attention to detail.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay Y.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and high quality
customer_reviews.text: This is THE PERFECT backpack for my three year old daughter. -It is super lightweight, but made with high quality materials. -There are many compartments for her to store her "things" in, and the colors are very vibrant. - I can already tell that this will be a staple item for her for many years to come as she can bring it to school, or just out and about on the weekends.
customer_reviews.author: ShellyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my two children to use at daycare. I was so surprised at how much they hold. I put 4 full size baby bottles, formula and a change of clothes in my son's bag and it fits perfectly. My toddler loves to take her blankie to and from school and loves carrying it in her "pack-pack" now. I have received so many compliments on them. Love.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: The Must-Have Preschool Backpack~~
customer_reviews.text: We have this backpack for our daughter for almost three years now. It has been in a lot of washes, but it still looks as new and as well-built as when we first go it. To be fair, she wasn't using it for regular school. She was using it for day care, which the backpack was not really being taking out or putting it back during the day. Pro: Absolutely adorable style; super quality material and construction; reasonably priced (I paid $12.49 in 2013) Con: none, I only wish they have a bigger version for older kids (elementary school age). It fits for preschool children, maybe up to kindergartener but no more.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for PreSchool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter for preschool! It is super cute and a perfect size for her little body. It doesn't overwhelm her like a lot of other backpacks. She loves it. It seems like the quality is good. I have not had to clean it yet, so I am not sure how easily it will be to do so but I don't think it will be difficult in any way. Great size for a 2-4 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: So stinking cute! I bought the whole set! Can’t quite figure out how the lunch box is supposed to attach to the backpack yet though. Haven’t used yet will update once it’s been used a few times. So far I love it
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Good well made backpack
customer_reviews.text: Good well made backpack, perfect size for my smaller toddler, with room to grow into it. The zippers are very well constructed (a problem with his last backpack), and all straps are well reinforced. Easily fits all the things he needs for preschool, and will leave plenty of room for his teachers to send home his crafts and projects. My son was extremely happy when he saw it which is great as he hated his old one, and never wanted to wear it. He hasn't taken this off yet!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Great Dinosaur Backpack
customer_reviews.text: My dinosaur loving 2 year old got this backpack for his birthday and loves it! The only thing I would change would be to add a chest clip like the toddler backpack has so that it’s easier for smaller children to keep on.
customer_reviews.author: Neal H.

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for pre-k 3 for my three year old. It’s super cute! I don’t recommend for children in 1st grade or higher. The backpack is small. It was only able to hold a folder folded in half and a nap blanket for the entire year. Perfect for preschoolers.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Olvera

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift to my niece which goes to daycare. It’s super cute!!! My sister fits in there a pack of wipes, diaper cream, eight diapers, one set of clothes, one bottle, her formula, and a pacifier with a toy. I think she could put another two items but overstuffing would make it look type bulky. The material is great!! I mean it’s skip-hop!! They’re great.
customer_reviews.author: Damarise Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Adorable backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought the owl backpack for my 2 1/2 year old son. He loves it! I was worried that it might be too big after looking at the pictures, but it fits him nicely with room to grow. I think he'll get a few more years of use out of it. The quality is very good. We went on a trip and he kept his toys, lovey blanket, and a board book in there. He feels like a big boy having a backpack like his big brother and sister.
customer_reviews.author: M Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Love love loooooveee this bag!
customer_reviews.text: It's an adorable bag! Very well made. I'm using it as a diaper bag and as my son grows it will be his first book bag. If everyone read the description size, they would know it's not a standard size book bag. I prefer using this as a diaper bag than any oversized diaper bag where I would lose what I need at the bottom of the bag and having to dig for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy and Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Love these backpacks I have two of them I have used them for traveling by car and plane and use in everyday activities and it is the only backpack that has lasted more than a year! Great buy! I love the pocket in the front and the side. It’s also the perfect size for my 4 and 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Rich T.

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well
customer_reviews.text: Still holding up after a year of pre-k. The last one we had was a hand-me-down that had been through a few years of use, so I'm confident that this will last awhile. Only thing to know is that it is smaller than a standard piece of printer paper, so anything going to and from class is guaranteed to get wrinkled. But it is more appropriately sized than the next size up for smaller kids, so it's really a judgment call.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Cute design and great function.
customer_reviews.text: These are great toddler backpacks. I have one for each of my kids to keep packed for short trips or to take to the church nursery. Would be great for preschool or just a fun bag to carry toys. The front pocket is great for snacks and it is big enough inside for essentials. The mesh pocket is great for a thermos or cup and the elastic top keeps it from sliding out. My 2 1/2 year old can wear it comfortably and if I loosen the straps so can I. Love the butterfly design. Material is easy to spot clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: The most adorable & useful backpack!
customer_reviews.text: best little backpack ever! perfect size for my 2 year old! So adorable and have gotten a ton of compliments! Large zipper fits a lot! I use this for school, so I fit blankets, sheets and snacks in there. There is also a great side pouch for a cup. There is a zipper in the front too, very spacious! Will continue to purchase this product for future needs!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great for little girls
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this backpack. It is super cute and the perfect size to hold all her treasures.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: While this super cute backpack caught my eye immeadiately, I have been pretty disappointed with the product. Within the first few days of use, the whole mouth unraveled and came off :( The off white part has been very difficult to spot clean, and ended up looking dingy and old from about a week of use. For the price, I hoped for better durability.
customer_reviews.author: BB-8

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too small
customer_reviews.text: Adorable but it's too small for preschool. My fault, I should have read the dimensions. It's not big enough to hold an 8.5x11 folder, which our school requires.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Toddler Bag
customer_reviews.text: We use this for my 2 year olds diaper bag and it works great! We have been using it for months now and it’s holding up very well. It also cleans up very easily. Holds diapers, wipes, clothes, and still has plenty of room for other stuff! Perfect size for my 2 year old to carry by herself.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly sized and super adorable
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! We have a short, but chunky 21 month old. This backpack still fits him nicely and will become even better as he grows more into "toddlerhood" Enough room (inside compartment) for his 1 change of clothes, 4 diapers, wipes case and 2 or 3 small toys. The bottle pocket fits his sippy cup and exterior from snack pocket holds a granola bar and blended fruit pouch.... It's just perfect for our current needs heading out for church or running errands.
customer_reviews.author: jessy5377

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, just a little small...
customer_reviews.text: This product is adorable!!! Bought it to use as a smaller diaper bag for my 1 year old, since we no longer need to tote around a suitcase full of stuff. I knew a toddler backpack was smaller than a regular one, guess I just didn't realize how much smaller! Was hoping to be able to wear this on my back buttt not so much. Will be adorable once she is able to wear it though. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kkeeler

customer_reviews.title: Has a heavier weight to it, probably more durable -  huge cuteness factor
customer_reviews.text: 5 star for smiles from my daughter. I mean thats why we buy these right? I'm not expecting much, but we have a few skip hop items. This one is her favorite. The quality seems much better then the Sanrio HK bag she has. It does add some extra weight, which is why we had her use the other one until recently. Now that she's older, she seems to carry it better
customer_reviews.author: Brian H. Lee

customer_reviews.title: We use it as a much smaller diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute bag. We have two under 2 and we use this bag on the daily. Our diaper bag is huge in order to hold all that we will need for several hours away from home. We will leave the big diaper bag in the car, and put the Skip Hop bag in our stroller. That way we have a few essentials with us, without toting a giant, bulky bag in the stores. We also use this one when we are just going to the playground for a bit. This is our second one we own and we highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: L'M

customer_reviews.title: Cute backpack, just too small for school
customer_reviews.text: Not good for school as every child has to have standard size folders and this backpack is not big enough to accommodate that without bending them. Very cute backpack though. Wish I could find an in between size from this and the big rolling version
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Well made quality back pack
customer_reviews.text: This back pack is really well made! Great for my four year old because zippers are so easy to unzip for little hands. She has to be able to do it all her self at school and I am confident with the zippers and durability of this back pack. We also bought the matching lunch bag and it fits perfectly with a little room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to the T
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is absolutely amazing! On top of being adorable it's also very spacious and light! Everything is just like the picture! My daughter is 18 months and this fits her perfect! 👌🏼 It has space for a bunch of necessities plus a cup holder on one side. I absolutely recommend this if you have a toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Skip hop zoo backpack
customer_reviews.text: We use this backpack for traveling with my daughter or to pack toys in for a road trip. We have even used it to pack stuff for a sleepover at grandma and grandpas house. It’s really cute and great quality. It fits a lot too!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Unicorn Magic!! Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Got this backpack for my 1 y/o in leu of a diaper bag and she loves it! We get compliments on it all the time and I like how its a unicorn which is a bit different from the usual animal backpacks. I use the side pocket for her sippy cup, and the inside is big enough to put diapers, snacks, and an extra set of clothes. I have had it for a few months and even though it is a light color I have yet to see any wear or tear from it. It still looks like it did when I first got it (which is amazing when you have a messy 1y/o).
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this little backpack
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little backpack. It’s perfect for a toddler. I’m using mine as a overnight bag and was able to fit 5 outfits, diapers, baby wipes and a small toiletry bag. Also added my daughters name.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Amazing backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack! My daughter takes this to preschool daily. She loves it. She’s so proud to carry it and it’s perfect size! It fits what we need it to, and holds her water bottle in a pocket on the size. This should last her a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Lucas

customer_reviews.title: I love these Skip Hop backpacks
customer_reviews.text: I love these Skip Hop backpacks. There are so many cute designs it is hard to choose just one. This backpack was just the right size for my 2 year old and she loves being able to have her own backpack. We use it as a little diaper bag. It is a perfect size for a few diapers, wipes and a change of clothes. Plus she loves to put some of her little toys in the front pocket. The zippers work easy enough for her to do them herself.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed I returned it.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a skip hop fan, like...really, I have a lot of the zoo collection items, I have other 4 backpacks, and this was the first one I got from amazon, quality was different this look cheaply made and smaller, I just returned.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and adorable
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is the perfect size for our two year old. She’s pretty tiny and it’s been great for her going to the babysitter or to her nana’s for a sleepover. It fits her water bottle in the side and it’s roomy enough for a change of clothes, a toy or two, a book, and some snacks.
customer_reviews.author: RMcMahon

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves this adorable little backpack. We got it for her for Christmas and she uses it to carry her toys to daycare. It's the perfect size for a toddler and allows children to practice carrying their own toys and belongings, and remembering to pack them up at the end of the day to go home. I believe the zipper has a nice sized pull tab, which is also ideal for little hands. If you are looking for something big enough to carry home papers from school without bending, this will be too small, but it is perfect for little ones that just want to practice a little independence, plus the design is just too cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to fit a vtech learner toy. Dimensions are accurate! Great quality and perfect size for toddlers. Love all the animal options.
customer_reviews.author: Felice Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two year olds
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2yr old nephew who would always want to carry his mom's backpack, which was twice his size. He is very independent and wants to do big kid things, so I really wanted to get him his own "pack pack". When I saw how freaking cute this was, I stopped looking - it is the perfect size for him and he wears it everywhere! It fits his toy trains and toy cars, or a few outfits or extra diapers! For a school age child, it may be too small for folders, but it's just perfect for a little boy who likes to carry around his belongings... And it the cutest thing ever!
customer_reviews.author: K. Rose

customer_reviews.title: They are made really well and super cute all the same
customer_reviews.text: My kids all have one of these backpacks. We first got some as gifts and as each subsequent child has gotten old enough they each get their own Skip Hop backpack. They are made really well and super cute all the same. We've even worn out 2 of them and replaced them with new Skip Hop backpacks bc we like them so much. They're really not a vacation packer though, as they don't hold too much. But they're perfect for a toddler weekender, road trip bag or any other outing that would require a few things to hold.
customer_reviews.author: cotigchez

customer_reviews.title: Cuteness Overload
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my little cousins birthday party which was unicorn themed. She loved it because she can now have something to take her toys in to school. According to her it’s a bit small to fit actual homework but perfect for a lot of toys. It a really nice backpack for young ones. It has a mesh pocket on the side that can hold a water bottle. Has a front zippered pocket in thr frong. Overall it just super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Magically

customer_reviews.title: Starting to fray from minimal use
customer_reviews.text: Cute little backpack for a toddler, it fits most books although large ones won't work. I like the different pockets although more partitions in the front pocket would be nice, maybe some mesh pockets inside. This gets used only occasionally, and has been taken care of fairly well, it gets hung up when not in use and the piping around the front pocket is coming undone. Maybe not the most durable material used. It looks fine otherwise but the poor materials and stitching make it look old.
customer_reviews.author: Mr B

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is amazing! We love the quality for the value
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is amazing! We love the quality for the value. The material seems to be a thick colored canvas that doesn't stain easily. We love the handy cup holder and the mesh net compartment inside the small zipper pocket. The best part is that our daughter absolutely loves her new backpack and wears it everywhere. Such a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M.N.

customer_reviews.title: A great backpack, so cute, but needs to be machine washable.
customer_reviews.text: Such a great first backpack for my preschooler. It IS a smaller backpack than we were expecting; it's the perfect size for her, but it IS small. It cannot comfortably fit a normal sized folder. It's also not machine washable which is UNBELIEVABLE when they know that this is for a preschooler. I mean...preschoolers always somehow get jam on their hands!!! This NEEDS to be machine washable. Other than that, it's a quality backpack that's unique and cute. We haven't seen another little one with this backpack, which is kind of cool.
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag for my 2 yr old! She takes it to daycare everyday and it holds so much! We also get compliments on how cute it is!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Surran

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Love skip hop brand. This is my diaper bag now my daughter is older and we don't need much. Perfect for a change of clothes, diapers and some snacks. Had a side pouch for a sippy cup too
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great little pack
customer_reviews.text: We love this backpack. It's super cute, the zippers work really well and it appears to be well made. I purchased the pack to carry our portable DVD player, headphones and some movies. It works out well! We are able to keep everything safely zipped inside, it's all contained in the car (zippers!) and we can grab the bag to take the payer and movies inside after trips, into the hotel, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jones

customer_reviews.title: Little girls love them
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack for my 2 year olf greatgrand. She loves it. She has the lunchbox to match. She loves to take it to daycare. Makes her feel like a big girl like her sister. Looks like it will hold up well
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: I love the zoo packs
customer_reviews.text: I love the zoo packs. My daughter has the owl with the matching lunchie and my son had the elephant with the elephant lunchie. They are well made, and I love that after a year of use (at least for my toddler who takes it to daycare everyday) it's still in good condition with very minor noticeable scuffs (and it definitely gets man-handled and abused). It's the perfect size to make an extended weekend's worth of outfits and necessities when we go to grandma's or to pack fun activities (including coloring books) and snacks when we go out.
customer_reviews.author: Giulia

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is super cute, high quality
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is super cute, high quality, and my daughter gets tons of compliment from her schoolmates. It is the perfect size for a child in kindergarten: with enough room for a lunch-kit, papers, and mits/scarf/hat for the winter. The side pocket for a water bottle is a great add on, although a water bottle would fit inside the bag along with everything else I mentioned just as well. Overall, I am super pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: H Drew

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Awesome toddler backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is adorable. My 15 month old loves to walk around with it on and it is so cute since it is almost as big as he is. I really like that the cup pocket on the side can fit his Camelbak Eddy kids water bottle. The main compartment has plenty of room for anything a toddler would want to take along with him. and the smaller front pouch is a great size for some snacks. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: W&E

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: We love this bag! I switched to this several months ago to be used as a diaper bag instead of the normal bulky bags. This works perfectly for a toddler and fits a lot of stuff. I even use it for all of my items instead of carrying a separate purse. We get compliments on how cute it is all the time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Too small for me. Better for a toddler with only a few things to carry
customer_reviews.text: It’s way too small for my needs. I looked at measurements when I bought it. Surprisingly still too small. You could not fit iPad with its case and anything else like coloring books etc. just not tall enough. I’ll be returning. Other than that, looks like a great backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Shalene

customer_reviews.title: Fun, functional backpack
customer_reviews.text: We've had this now for about 6 months and it looks new as day one. My 3 y/o son loves this and takes it to school every day. The inside could be a bit bigger, but it is a kids backpack! I like that it has the separate outer pocket and side part for a waterbottle. We'll probably be back to buy another design later.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

product_meta.title: Skip Hop Toddler Backpack, 12" School Bag, Unicorn
product_meta.description:
Style:Backpack| Color:Unicorn

The backpack where fun meets function! Whimsical details and durable materials make this the perfect pack for on-the-go! Easily holds all the supplies your preschooler might need for a busy day of "work" and play, and the mesh side pocket adjusts to fit a juice box, sippy cup or water bottle. The front pouch is ideal for snacks and includes extra pockets for pencils and other travel necessities. Comfy padded straps go easy on little shoulders!

Product Features: 
- Roomy main compartment
- Insulated pouch for snacks
- Adjustable mesh bottle pocket
- Padded, adjustable comfy straps
- Write-on nametag inside
- Easy-to-clean lining
- Phthalate-free
- Size (inches): 11l x 5w x 12h; (cm): 28l x 13w x 30h.
feature_bullets: Perfect back pack for toddler to preschool to kindergarten
School bag includes an insulated front pouch to keep snacks and lunch at the right temperature
Canvas material and easy-to-clean lining makes for the perfect backpack for kids on the go
Roomy main compartment to fit all of your little one's things. Size (inches) 11l x 5w x 12h
Includes an adjustable mesh bottle pocket and is Phthalate-free.Not suitable for children under 3 years

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars6,848 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
